title: ExcelMAX Function

metadata.description: Learn about ExcelMAX Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title:
Excel
MAX Function

MAX Function
The
MAX
function is a premade function in Excel
content_sections.content: , which finds the highest number in a range.

content_sections.title: It is typed
content_sections.content:
=MAX
The function ignores cells with text. It will only work for cells with numbers.
Note:
There is another function called
MIN
, which finds the lowest value in a range, the opposite of
MAX
.

content_sections.title: Type
content_sections.content:
=MAX
Double click the
MAX
command
Select a range (
D2:D21
)
Hit enter
Let's have a look at an example!
Find the Pokemon which has the highest total stats in the range
D2:D21
:
Name	Type 1	Type 2	Total stats		
    Mankey	Fighting		305		
    Poliwrath	Water	Fighting	510		
    Victreebel	Grass	Poison	490		
    Tentacool	Water	Poison	335		
    Magneton	Electric	Steel	465		MAX
    Dewgong	Water	Ice	475		
    Cloyster	Water	Ice	525		
    Onix	Rock	Ground	385		
    Dragonair	Dragon		420		
    Pidgeotto	Normal	Flying	349		
    Rattata	Normal		253		
    Beedrill	Bug	Poison	395		
    Doduo	Normal	Flying	310		
    Kingler	Water		475		
    Nidoqueen	Poison	Ground	505		
    Hitmonchan	Fighting		455		
    Charmeleon	Fire		405		
    Arbok	Poison		438		
    Gastly	Ghost	Poison	310		
    Magikarp	Water		200
Copy Values
That's great!
The function has successfully found the highest value,
525
. Cloyster has the highest Total stats of the Pokemons in the range
D2:D21
.
Let's add text to a cell in the range
D2:21
to see what happens. Type Alakazam to
D8
.
Nice going.
The function ignores the text typed in the range.
510
is returned as the new highest value, since the old one was replaced with text. Poliwrath is now the Pokemon with the highest Total stats in the range
D2:D21
.

★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers ExcelMAX Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use ExcelMAX Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of ExcelMAX Function and how to apply it in your projects.
